definitions.text: identify the location or place of
examples: We localized the source of the infection

definitions.text: concentrate on a particular place or spot
examples: The infection has localized in the left eye

definitions.text: restrict something to a particular area

examples: The film is set in Africa

definitions.text: confined or restricted to a particular location
examples: the localized infection formed a definite abscess
a decentralized and localized political authority
